oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wie die Humusentwicklung langfristig sichern?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Raupp, Dr Joachim
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Production systems
Soil biology
Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The article underlines the importance of humus maintenance in organic farming and describes some important agronomic tools to achieve it based on long-term field experiments. The particular role of farmyard manure is discussed compared to other fertilizers. Effects of different crop rotation systems and of biodynamic preparations are also described.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Raupp, Dr Joachim (2002) Wie die Humusentwicklung langfristig sichern? Ökologie & Landbau (4), pp. 9-11.
